import React from 'react'; import AddressForm from './AddressForm.js'; import { MDBRow, MDBContainer, MDBInput, MDBCol, MDBFormInline, MDBIcon, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; export class BecomeHost extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', phone: 0, length: 0, width:0, height:0, spaceDescription:'', spaceType: '' } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange(event, type){ console.log("Type: " + type); console.log("value: " + event.target.value); this.setState({ [type]:event.target.value }); } handleSubmit(){ console.log("submit!"); } render(){ return(

My OpenSpace Profile

this.handleChange(event, 'firstName')} label="First *" group type="text" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'lastName')} label="Last *" group type="text" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'email')} label="Email *" group type="email" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'phone')} label="Phone *" group type="tel" validate required /> {/*Where is it*/} Type of space this.handleChange(event, 'spaceType')}> this.handleChange(event, 'length')} label="length" group type="number" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'width')} label="width" group type="number" validate required /> this.handleChange(event, 'height')} label="height" group type="number" validate required />

Describe your space

 this.handleChange(event, 'spaceDescription')} type="textarea" label="ex: My space is oddly shaped, has AC,..." rows="5" cols="100"/> Submit
); } } export default BecomeHost;
